page.title: 19A Man With A Hobby
page.content: There is a gentleman who lives in our area who has a special{hobby}which started 30years ago;{photography. } Although the first slide was taken in Egypt it was a relative of his wife who wanted 6 picture postcards of Tickhill{streets}making into{slides.} Now there are around 4,600 Tickhill slides some from 1897 pictures. Over the years,whenever a part of Tickhill has changed,our friend has dashed out to{record}for all time what happened. The early cost of 12 slides was 18p (3s.6d)now 36 slides cost Â£6.60. Today this hobby means a treat of{film {shows}for the people of Tickhill.They are given for the benefit of local and distant charities.All functions are well received and{enjoyed by all.}250 slides are the most one can absorb per session.
